string::ends_with (2 of 2 overloads)

Return whether the string ends with a character.

Synopsis 
bool
ends_with(
    char ch) const;
Description

Returns true if the string ends with ch, and false otherwise.

Complexity

Constant.

Parameters

Name

Description

ch

The character to check for.
